import './index.scss' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker} from 'react-leaflet' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef() const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm( 'service_qexfzem', 'template_z2uigvc', refForm.current, 'USYJzVW1eY88G4eMQ' ) .then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, please try again') } ) } return ( <>

I am interested in freelance opportunities - especially on ambitious or large projects. However, if you have any other requests or questions, don't hesitate to contact me using below form either.

Merick Szeto
California
Los Angeles


szetomerick@gmail.com
) } export default Contact
